pkgmetadata.longdescription: Compute HUM Value and Visualize ROC Curves // Tools for computing HUM (Hypervolume Under the Manifold) value to estimate features ability to discriminate the class labels, visualizing the ROC curve for two or three class labels (Natalia Novoselova, Cristina Della Beffa, Junxi Wang, Jialiang Li, Frank Pessler, Frank Klawonn (2014) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btu086).
